name: HotspotBypass
tagline: An application to test your personal hotspot authentication.
body:
## Important Note
I intended this software for TESTING, not actual attacks!

## Usage
Download compiled .app or build from source.

## How to Build
Clone into this repo. Then do
```
npm install
```
in your command prompt. You'll need Node and NPM installed.

After that you can run
```
npm run dev
```
for the application to launch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
